src_original: peyālam /  āha- kiṃ tvaṃ pāpīyannāttamanā bhūyāḥ yadi mucyethāḥ /
atha khalu suyāmo devaputro mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat- utsṛja mañjuśrīrmāraṃ pāpīyāṃsam /  gacchatu svabhavanam /
atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto māraṃ pāpīyāṃsametadavocat- kenāsi pāpīyan baddho yadātmānamutsṛjasi?
āha- na jāne mañjuśrīḥ- kenāsmi baddhaḥ iti /
āha- yathā tvaṃ pāpīyan abaddho baddhasaṃjñī,
